channel.title: AV+ from Commercial Integrator
channel.description: AV+, the new podcast from Commercial Integrator magazine, tackles all things commercial tech & pro AV integration.
channel.copyright: 20 Commercial Integrator, a Division of EH Publishing, Inc.
channel.itunes:author: Commercial Integrator
channel.itunes:summary: AV+, the new podcast from Commercial Integrator magazine, tackles all things commercial tech & pro AV integration.

item.title: EP 98 - Teams Tips!
item.itunes:summary: Do your employees -- or even your clients! -- need some Microsoft Teams tips? We've got you covered on episode 98 of AV+.

item.title: EP 97 - How to Get Through This
item.description: We’re not going to lie, this is a serious time for many AV integration firms — but there are things they can do to stay afloat in this economy.
item.itunes:summary: We're not going to lie, this is a serious time for many AV integration firms -- but there are things they can do to stay afloat in this economy.

item.title: EP 96 - 22-Screen Bar
item.description: A project of this scale, for such a small space, required smart distribution… and then selling the client on IP over a matrix. On Episode 96 of AV+… The story behind this sports bar with 22 screens and counting is a fascinating example of good salesmanship, openness with the customer, and wisely futureproofing a system [&ellip;]
item.itunes:summary: A project of this scale, for such a small space, required smart distribution… and then selling the client on IP over a matrix. On Episode 96 of AV+… The story behind this sports bar with 22 screens and counting is a fascinating example of good salesmanship, openness with the customer, and wisely futureproofing a system [&ellip;]

item.title: EP 95 - Being an AV Leader
item.description: These are some NSCA Business and Leadership Conference 2020 lessons Pro AV leaders can bring to their own integration firms.
item.itunes:summary: These are some NSCA Business and Leadership Conference 2020 lessons Pro AV leaders can bring to their own integration firms.

item.title: EP 94 - Future of Work isn't Tech
item.description: One of the most important talks at NSCA BLC 2020 centered around the future of work and why humans – not tech – are at the center of it.
item.itunes:summary: One of the most important talks at NSCA BLC 2020 centered around the future of work and why humans - not tech - are at the center of it.

item.title: EP 93 - Better AV Marketing
item.description: On episode 93 of AV+, we run through some tips integrators can reach more potential clients through a better marketing approach.
item.itunes:summary: On episode 93 of AV+, we run through some tips integrators can reach more potential clients through a better marketing approach.

item.title: EP 92 - ISE 2020 Recap
item.description: We scoured the ISE 2020 show floors. Here are the trends in technology we’re taking away from the show this year on episode 92 of AV+. See all our coverage here.
item.itunes:summary: We scoured the ISE 2020 show floors. Here are the trends in technology we're taking away from the show this year on episode 92 of AV+.

item.title: EP 91 - Billion Dollar Integrators?!
item.description: On ep. 91 of AV+, industry journalist Craig MacCormack tells us about how the biggest merger deals in pro AV history happened within 24 hours of each other. Link to the full story: AVI-SPL and Whitlock Mega-Merger Surprised Both Companies’ Execs Too
item.itunes:summary: On ep. 91 of AV+, industry journalist Craig MacCormack tells us about how the biggest merger deals in pro AV history happened within 24 hours of each other.

item.title: EP 90 - ISE 2020 Guide
item.description: What are some must-sees on the ISE 2020 show floor? Where should you eat? What Amsterdam attractions should you visit? All this & more on AV+.
item.itunes:summary: What are some must-sees on the ISE 2020 show floor? Where should you eat? What Amsterdam attractions should you visit? All this & more on AV+.

item.title: EP 89 - Timecrunch!
item.itunes:summary: On ep. 89 of AV+, we chat with an installer who was able to tackle two of the most common challenges an integrator faces: timing and scope creep.
